title: Shrimp Tacos with Mango Salsa
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine shrimp, olive oil, chili powder, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook shrimp in a single layer for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through and opaque.
In a separate bowl, mix together mango, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro, and lime juice to create the mango salsa.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or in the microwave for a few seconds.
Assemble tacos by placing a few shrimp in each tortilla and topping with mango salsa.
